commands.name: register
commands.help: Sign in the UE to Core

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: register [--amf] [--smf] [--help]
--amf      : Register UE to AMF
--smf      : Register UE to SMF
--help     : Show this help message

commands.name: amf-info
commands.help: Show some status information about the given AMF

subcommands.name: --status
subcommands.response: ${amf-name} Status for gNodeB ${nodeName}: Connected and operational

arguments.name: amf-name
arguments.description: AMF Name to show status for

arguments.name: amf-name
arguments.description: AMF Name to show detail for

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: amf-info [--status] [--detail] [amf-name]
--status : Show AMF status
--detail : Show AMF detail

commands.name: amf-list
commands.help: List all AMFs associated with the gNB

subcommands.name: --all
subcommands.response:
AMF List for gNodeB ${nodeName}:
AMF-01
AMF-02
AMF-03

subcommands.name: --active
subcommands.response:
Active AMFs connected to gNodeB ${nodeName}:
AMF-02
AMF-03

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: amf-list [--all] [--active]
--all : List AMFs
--active    : List active AMFs

commands.name: ue-list
commands.help: List all UEs associated with the gNodeB

subcommands.name: --help
subcommands.response:
Usage: ue-list [--all] [--active]
--all : List all UEs associated with the gNodeB
--active    : List active UEs associated with the gNodeB

subcommands.name: --all
subcommands.response:
Connected UEs for gNodeB ${nodeName}:
imsi-306956963543741
imsi-306950959944062

subcommands.name: --active
subcommands.response:
Active UEs connected to gNodeB ${nodeName}:
imsi-306950959944062

commands.name: ue-list
commands.help: List all UEs registered with this AMF

subcommands.name: --all
subcommands.response:
All UEs registered with AMF ${nodeName}:
UE-001
UE-002
UE-003

subcommands.name: --active
subcommands.response:
Active UEs registered with AMF ${nodeName}:
UE-001
UE-003
